H0.text: where can carbon be found in the biosphere. Oceans

H1.text: where can carbon be found in the biosphere. Trees

H2.text: where can carbon be found in the biosphere. Phytoplankton

H3.text: where can carbon be found in the biosphere. soil

A4.text: The ocean contains the largest active pool of carbon near the surface of the Earth.

A5.text: soil holds approximately 1,500 gigatons of carbon

A6.text: terrestrial vegetation holds approximately 610 gigatons of carbon

A7.text: Phytoplankton are crucial players in the Earth's carbon cycle.

A8.text: Phytoplankton release dissolved organic carbon (DOC) into the ocean.
